<h3 id="X22505">X(22505) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO 1st ANTI-BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^8-(b^2+c^2)*a^6-(b^4+c^4)*a^4+(b^2+c^2)*(2*b^4-3*b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^2-(2*b^4-b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22505) = 3*X(4)+X(147) = 5*X(4)-X(148) = 3*X(4)-X(6321) = 9*X(4)+X(14692) = 5*X(147)+3*X(148) = X(147)-3*X(6033) = 3*X(147)-X(14692) = 2*X(147)+3*X(22515) = X(148)+5*X(6033) = 3*X(148)-5*X(6321) = 9*X(148)+5*X(14692) = 2*X(148)-5*X(22515) = 3*X(6033)+X(6321) = 9*X(6033)-X(14692) = 2*X(6033)+X(22515) = 3*X(6321)+X(14692) = 2*X(6321)-3*X(22515)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(5999).</p>
<p>X(22505) lies on these lines:
{3,7899}, {4,147}, {5,2794}, {20,15561}, {30,114}, {98,381}, {99,382}, {115,546}, {146,15545}, {316,5976}, {542,1353}, {543,15687}, {549,6721}, {550,620}, {671,14269}, {690,1539}, {1478,12185}, {1479,12184}, {1657,21166}, {2023,5475}, {2783,22938}, {2784,18483}, {2787,22799}, {2799,19160}, {3023,3585}, {3027,3583}, {3091,9862}, {3543,8724}, {3545,14830}, {3818,22681}, {3830,6054}, {3832,14651}, {3839,5984}, {3843,12188}, {3850,10991}, {3851,14061}, {3853,14981}, {3857,20398}, {3858,11623}, {4027,14041}, {5026,5103}, {5066,6055}, {5149,7825}, {5985,17577}, {6226,18511}, {6227,18509}, {6287,16044}, {7687,15535}, {7728,11005}, {7841,10352}, {7970,18525}, {8980,18538}, {9772,19910}, {9818,9861}, {9860,18492}, {9864,12699}, {9880,14893}, {9955,11710}, {10053,10895}, {10069,10896}, {10086,12953}, {10089,12943}, {10742,10768}, {10753,18440}, {11737,14971}, {12117,15684}, {12176,18502}, {12178,18491}, {12179,18495}, {12180,18497}, {12181,18507}, {12182,18516}, {12183,18517}, {12186,18520}, {12187,18522}, {12189,18542}, {12190,18544}, {13665,19056}, {13785,19055}, {13967,18762}, {14230,22625}, {14233,22596}, {15704,20399}, {17504,22247}, {18761,22504}, {22501,22502}</p>
<p>
X(22505) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 10722}, {4, 6033}, {99, 382}, {146, 15545}, {3543, 8724}, {3830, 6054}, {7728, 11005}, {7970, 18525}, {9864, 12699}, {10742, 10768}, {10753, 18440}, {12117, 15684}, {12181, 18507}<br>
X(22505) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (115, 546), (550, 620), (9880, 14893)<br>
X(22505) = complement of X(38741)<br>
X(22505) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 147, 6321), (3830, 13188, 10723), (3843, 12188, 14639), (6033, 6321, 147), (6054, 10723, 13188)<br>
</p>
